title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Job Fairs
body: Job Fairs       Interested in working at Wolf Trap? Most jobs are seasonal, beginning in mid-May and ending in September. Many involve outdoor work and most require night and weekend shifts. Get all the information about summer jobs by attending a Job Fair. Participating in one of the park's job fairs is a great way to learn more about employment.  Talk directly to park supervisors about job opportunities. Learn about careers in the National Park Service. Learn how to apply for a job.  Wolf Trap Job Fairs for Summer 2016: Wednesday, January 6, 3:00-7:00 p.m. Saturday, January 9, 12:00-4:00 p.m.  Job Fairs will be held inside the Filene Center. For directions to the park, visit Directions & Transportation. Once in the park follow signs for job fair parking.
